modName: R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor texture upgrade
summary: simple resolution upgrade to for the Eisen Platte Armor by NPR
descriptionHtml:
With all the high res texture packs ive gotten used to not seeing blury textures all over the place and noticed this mod still uses the low res stuff, so doubled the resolutions and sharpened it up, very simple alteration. Works with both UNP and CBBE versions of the mod


Installation:
First download and install one of the the original  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11050]R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 V2[/url] 
then overwrite it with these textures manually or with NMM

As an option you can remove the upgraded \"lowmain_n.dds\" included and use the original mods version which is 4MB smaller if every bit of memory counts. I cant confirm one way or the other if resizing that helped improve the detail, only worked on the idea it would in theory, the textures themselves give the main improvement. 

update: ive also done the same thing with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11756]R18Pn Leer armor[/url] but havent tested ingame, it should be the same level improvement as the Eisen, and only replaces the textures so install the Leer armor mod first, its uploaded here as an optional file

thanks NPR for this great armor and letting me tweak it, and thanks everyone for the endorsements, will definately do some more soon

Also for a few alternate versions of the Eisen Platte Armor try
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12534]R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP CBBEv3 ReColor-STEEL[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15419]R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor Royal ReTexture[/url]
author: nisen
